mapper.select: SELECT board.*, likeCnt, commCnt FROM board left join ( SELECT comment.board_no, likeCnt, commCnt FROM (SELECT board_no, count(*) likeCnt FROM likes group by board_no) likes right join (SELECT board_no, count(*) commCnt FROM comment group by board_no) comment ON likes.board_no = comment.board_no GROUP BY likes.board_no) innerTable ON board.board_no = innerTable.board_no WHERE board.board_no = #{value} GROUP BY board.board_no;
